name: fend-mobile-portfolio
description: this is the project for frontend nanodegree[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[Csecond [2~project [2~for frontend nanodegree to practice how to optimize the speed of a page.
author: Yuguo LI

scripts.mktopfolder: mkdirp dist/css -p && mkdirp dist/js -p && mkdirp dist/img -p
scripts.mkpizzafolder: mkdirp dist/views/js -p && mkdirp dist/views/css -p && mkdirp dist/views/images -p
scripts.mergecss: cleancss -o dist/css/app.css src/css/* && cleancss -o dist/views/css/app.css src/views/css/*
scripts.optimizecss: cleancss -O1 specialComments:off dist/css/app.css > dist/css/app.min.css && cleancss -O1 specialComments:off dist/views/css/app.css > dist/views/css/app.min.css
scripts.autoprefixer: postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/css/* && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/views/css/*
scripts.uglifytop: mkdirp dist/js -p && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.uglifypizza: mkdirp dist/views/js -p && uglifyjs src/views/js/*.js -m -o dist/views/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/views/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/views/js/app.min.js
scripts.imagemin: imagemin src/img/* -o dist/img && imagemin src/views/images/* -o dist/views/images
scripts.copyhtml: cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/views/*.html dist/views/
